item.title: HDFC Capital Advisors: Corporate Internship Project
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In collaboration with Harvard Entrepreneurship Collective and Learn with Leaders. Embark on an 8-week Experiential Learning Project Tackling a Fortune 500 real-world business problem, guided by a Harvard undergraduate mentor to craft live solutions that address the impact of Green Finance for residential real estate funds.

The post HDFC Capital Advisors: Corporate Internship Project appeared first on Learn with leaders.
item.content:encoded:
In collaboration with Harvard Entrepreneurship Collective and Learn with Leaders.

Embark on an 8-week Experiential Learning Project Tackling a Fortune 500 real-world business problem, guided by a Harvard undergraduate mentor to craft live solutions that address the impact of Green Finance for residential real estate funds.

The post HDFC Capital Advisors: Corporate Internship Project appeared first on Learn with leaders.
